tags: None
review:
we consulted Dr. Shiva Reddy Sir at Apollo in 2015 and in our first appointment only he spend more time and interacted very well with patient (my dad) and given very much confidence to him to undergo for the knee replacement. My father is facing this knee pain from past 11 years all the doctors suggested knee replacement is the only solution. But Dr. Shiva Reddy explained the problem in detail and explained each and every question that my father asked with same way even thought its silly one. 
My father only after appointment with Dr. Shiva Reddy, agreed for the operation. Dr Sir given very positives words to my father so that my father got that confidence to under went surgery.
Dr Shiva Reddy completed surgery successfully and his care when we are in hospital is exceptional every day he monitor my father very closely. Even after the Surgery whenever we meet the doctor for visiting/appointment he spend more time and only when we say no more questions/ queries then only he will move to the next work. Now My father is having no pain and walking as normal way.
my bottom of my heart am thanking Dr. Shiva Reddy Sir.
Thanks you very much Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hello! My name is Varshith, and I'm 9 years old. I'm in the 4th grade. I've been learning badminton for the past year. During one of my fitness classes, I had a sudden fall. Following the incident, we consulted Dr. Shivareddy sir, He recommended an MRI scan after the initial examination. The report revealed a complete tear of my right knee ligament. Sir patiently explained each and every question that my father asked with same way even thought its silly one and provided lot of confidence to my father, including the need for ACL reconstruction surgery and the precautions before and after the procedure. We proceeded with the surgery at the hospital and went successful. Sir provided excellent care and monitroing daily 2-3 times. He is very kind and friendly, suggested simple tablets and referred me to a Physiotherapist by taking extra care and explained about my surgery details. I highly recommend him for any orthopedic concerns.

tags: None
review:
Dr. is very good and confident about his diagnosis. It's been almost 6 months back I had a minor bike accident resulted deep pain on my right shoulder. Consulted with one of the general physician but the pain was not getting relieved then at that time, for the second opinion, I consulted with Dr. Shivareddy by seeing his review on practo and by looking into the earler xray and investigation he confirmed me nothing to worry and also explained why the pain is lasting little longer which is what we expect from a good dr. like him is the assurance and make the patient relaxed, comfortable and worry free.

Butttt... regarding prescribed medicine I was little surprised that the medicines are only available at the medical shop inside of his clinic.. :(.. l  kind of searched through almost 7-8 medical shop near to my house then one of the shop on the same road of his clinic told me these are only available at his clinic which is something I was not expecting from a good dr. like him, I had to go back to his clinic again for purchasing the same medicines, otherwise I could have rated 4 star.. can't rate 5 as my case was minor, but consultations wise he is definitely good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Aikya Clinic is clean and well managed. I visited shivareddy Doctor due to my toe pain. He observed the swelling and immediately prescribed for an X Ray. I was thinking why x ray is required without even checking my leg physically. But to my surprise x-ray report showed collapse fracture. Doctor explained me the report with patience. Doctor prescribed some set of medicines or ointment. He said it will be cured in a week, not to use any medicine. This I liked most. Overall a good experience.I would recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: None
review: Consulted with Dr Shiva Reddy for ortho. He asked to take xray. By the time we take xray (30 mins) he left and we were asked to come Mhospitalonday by representative. when we said we can't they asked a junior doctor to address for consultation and he dint explain about the medicine. He just says if you want to buy then you can buy or not. Never recommended Manipal to anyone

tags: None
review:
Such humble and patient doctor. We have generally seen doctors who rush through for attending more patients and generalise everyone into same bucket.

My mother ankle got fractured in December last year. Even after 7 months it was not completely cured and still limps a little. This may have to with issues with age and other bone related issues. 

Our main concern was weather to go for Ankle fusion if it does not heal completely. 

Doctor was patient to listen to all the history and explained issues with fusion and asked to continue with few exercises and confirmed that it might take more time heal.

One more thing I liked was to give few  tips to me and suggest physio for my shoulder pain without extra fee.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am probably writing this 3 hrs late which I should have done before. I met with a serious accident and had a truck went over my arm around elbow. There were high chances of an arm loss. Dr Shivareddy performed the surgery that lasted for about 6+ hours. He had to perform some serous reshaping and reconstructions. My arm was not only saved, I am also able to resume almost 90% operational activities with this hand. He was as good as Divine intervention for me during that moment of crisis

tags: None
review:
I explained everything clearly but didn't get the correcr answer of my questions.
Not recommending.
He kept talking on phone during the process.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was too good, pain reduced drastically.  

The physio therapist explained in detail on cause and prevention.  

Receptionist too was very cordial.

Overall excellent experience.

There was some confusion in timing mentioned in Practo which resulted in multiple visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ***** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ***** He takes good care of his patients gives enough time to his patients to explain their health issues, and never rush to prescribe dozens of medicines like other doctors in the region.
I have visited Dr. Shiva Reddy along with my daughter for her knee treatment after an accident.His words gave me courage to withstand the shock and mydaughter recovered in a short span and with minimum medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We have consulted Dr.ShivaReddy for my family. he is very good listener and comfortable with the patients. He will suggest some tests if there is requirement only. I will suggest anyone who has health issues related to body pains. Only thing need to improve is clinic ambience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Dr Siva Reddy is physically observe the patient and listen the patient problems which we are explaining. We really impressed his interaction with patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good Doctor to consult with, with simple exercises and medicines got my mascular spasm cured. He is friendly too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i had fallen from stairs and was having very tuff time with my knee pain.. prior to visiting him i had went to couple of other doctors and taken so many of medicines nothing helped..after visting him within 2 days my pain had completely vanished without taking medicines.. they way he examines and explain you the problem and its procedure of curing is super awesum.. frankly speaking i had visited him around an year back still i thank him each and every day bcoz the oinments helps me day in and out with my other joint pains.. :) .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hardly we can find a doctor with so much patience to listen and analyzing the health issues with so good explanation .

Actually i went for my husband toe pain, at the end of his consultation requested doctor for some suggestion for my hand pain. Though I have not taken the appointment, but still the doctor was hearing me for around 10 mins and deeply analysed my case and asked for some test and was wondering the report shows abnormality and now i am waiting to consult him with the test report. 

Awesome doctor and hope other doctors too can learn from his way of working *** **** ******** ***** , actual finding the issue than just doing experiments on patient and  being in rush always ,which really irritating after paying a lot of money for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Reddy is thorough professional. We went for my father’s knee related concerns following a fall. He had suffered stroke 6 years back and doctor attributed the jerky knee to neurological reasons rather than orthopaedic. The swelling on the leg was attributed to the tight knee can we had used when he was complaining jerky knee.No unnecessary tests or medications prescribed. Doctor advised my father to continue the physiotherapy and rehabilitation, which he had discarded long back. Of course he adviced caution while walking. Recommend the doctor for his approachability and straight forward diagnosis.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Firstly he listens to all your concerns carefully. Second verifies the problem, third provide appropriate treatment . He did not suggest any fancy scans or x rays. All he did was examine the pain area with some stretches and spot on identified the issue n also advised to consult the Physio in the same hospital - she was an excellent and helped me out with exercise also wrote it to me so I can remember. I can confidently say I am already feeling better mentally and physically. No pain so far after the visit .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: They say a good doctor heals half of the pain and we had the privilege of getting treated under Dr. Shivareddy. My husband had prevailing pain in his lower back for about 2 weeks, after trying many alternatives we took the decision to visit Dr. Shivareddy at Manipal hospital. The diagnosis was quick, he advised us for an MRI suspect the issue and later explained us clearly from the reports as to what has happened and what kind of surgery will be required. But above all what makes Dr. Shivareddy an ideal doctor is his humble and courteous nature towards the patient and his family, he was in direct contact with us and helped us with the insurance, admission process etc making it so easy for us. Its about that one touch which heals and gives confidence, for this we would like to thank the doctor and recommend him to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is very humble and down to earth. I consulted doctor for my mother, as she had sore foot. As my mother was unable move her feet easily, doctor sat down to examine the problem. I hardly see that in modern doctors. Just after first dose, my mother is feeling good.
One more thing about doctor, he had a time sens. I booked my appointment online and I was at clinic in time. But receptionist didn't allow me to get in and was preferring some other walk in patient. Doctor protectively came out and called me at right time, which allowed me to complete my other planned works later.
Clinic needs to educate receptionists to allow patients who have the booking and address in time to clinic, else it beats meaning of booked appointment.

tags: None
review:
I've met with bike accident and went for jammed calf  muscle and mild pain at one side of knee only at certain position. He listened to all my symptoms and verified the motions of knee. Adviced with simple tablets and told no need  to expose to x-ray as I have complete motion in all directions similar to my other leg without any inside pain.

I've taken medicines given for two days and I see I'm 80% recovered.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Shivareddy's advice was very simple and he suggested for natural treatment rather than popping so and so pills. His way of physical examination and careful attention to patient's all details is commendable.

I would recommend Dr. Shivareddy for all types of orthopedic problems.

tags: None
review: He explained the real cause.  He understood an listened to the issue effectively. He told to take rest immidiately. Thanks to him.

tags: None

tags: None
review: I recommend Dr. Shiva Reddy is a good doctor.  I am sharing my experience here; We met with an accident. Two years old son got injured and not able to stand and walk properly after a week also. Antibiotic was running a week 3 times a day, its suggested by pedestrian. We got scared and decided to consult orthopedist. Doctor did the check up and gave suggestion continue the observation and took the x-ray "knee AP and lateral" and consulted again. Doctor suggested to continue the same medicine 2 times a day for next 3days as it's light fracture. Followed the same and now baby is good, walking well. Thank you for valuable suggestion and direction.

review: He asked the right questions to diagnose the issue and did not uselessly recommend any scans or MRIs which is a very common practice among all the practitioners these days. Fortunately, I found Dr. Shiavreddy on Practo and his treatment helped me get relief. Thanks, Practo!
